items.name: waitlist
items.title: Waitlist Element
items.description: An animated waitlist signup form with Clerk integration
items.docs:
To get your Clerk API keys:

1. Create an account at https://clerk.com
2. Create a new application
3. Go to Configure > API Keys
4. Copy the Publishable Key and Secret Key
5. Add them to your .env.local file
6. Go to Configure > Restrictions > Sign-up mode and enable Waitlist

The waitlist component uses Clerk's waitlist feature to collect email signups with built-in validation and duplicate prevention.

items.name: theme-switcher
items.title: Theme Switcher
items.description: A theme switcher component with animated sun/moon icons
items.docs:
To use this component:

1. Install next-themes: npm install next-themes
2. Wrap your app with ThemeProvider from next-themes
3. Set up your CSS variables for light/dark themes

The theme switcher automatically handles light/dark mode with smooth transitions and animated icons.
